Text:
Install this driver once XP is booted and you are ready to go after a restart.

Enjoy!

Thank you Jesus Christ.

Jesus Christ!  Try the NVIDIA website direct first.  If that does not work, then use this one.  It should be the same one.  I have an old and dusty eMachines T3104 so it only has drivers to activate the NVIDIA card for XP.  So that is why I am using this version.
